definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: The path has never been perfect.
sentences.chinese: 道路從來不可能總是平坦的通途。

sentences.english: In low cost situation, completes the high smoothness of the DSO channel design.
sentences.chinese: 在低成本情況下，完成高平坦度的DSO通道設計。

sentences.english: The road to love is never smooth.
Cheeks - Smoothly formed and flat, without heavy jowls.
sentences.chinese: 面頰平滑而平坦，顎部不能太重。

sentences.english: This puts the swing perpendicular to the wheel and produces the flattest surface.
sentences.chinese: 這使擺動垂直輪和生產平坦的表面。

sentences.english: Our car bowled along the smooth country roads.
sentences.chinese: 我們的汽車在平坦的鄉間道路上很快地行駛。

sentences.english: Jean Valjean mounted this inclined plane and reached the other side of the quagmire.
sentences.chinese: 冉阿讓走上這平坦的斜坡，就走到了泥沼的另一邊。

sentences.english: The course of true love never did run smooth.
sentences.chinese: 真正的愛情之路永不會是平坦的。

sentences.english: The course of true love never did run smooth. ( Shakespeare )
sentences.chinese: 真誠的愛情之路永不會是平坦的。

sentences.english: Contains a large file-sized flat storage pocket.
sentences.chinese: 包含一個大文件大小的平坦的儲物袋。

sentences.english: The course of ture love never did run smooth.
sentences.chinese: 真正的愛情之路是不平坦的。

sentences.english: Solution for flat breast, left-right asymmetry.
sentences.chinese: 解決胸部平坦，左右不對稱。
股市下滑，恢復道路不平坦。

sentences.english: Even, life is not even, love Even for ever.
sentences.chinese: 即使生活不會一路平坦，也要愛伊文到永遠。

sentences.english: The hills flatten out here, and the ground is almost level.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的山丘變平了，地面基本上是平坦的。

sentences.english: Can use sparge law or direct contact inspection, apply to even and minor verrucous put oneself in another's position.
sentences.chinese: 可用噴霧法或直接接觸法，適用於平坦較小的疣體。

definition: flat land one could gallop straight across (idiom); wide expanse of flat country
potholed and bumpy road (idiom); fig. full of disappointment and dashed hopes
